3 Day Split - 5x5 Method

Monday - Full Body SetsxReps Wednesday - Full Body SetsxReps Friday - Full Body SetsxReps
Squat 5x5 Squat 5x5 Squat 5x5
Bench Press 5x5 Overhead Press 5x5 Bench Press 5x5
Pendlay Row 5x5 Deadlift 3x5 Barbell Row 5x5
Tricep Pushdown 2x12-15 Lateral Raises 3x12-15 Tricep Pushdown 2x12-15
Bicep Curl 2x12-15 Bicep Curl 2x12-15 Hammer Curl 2x12-15
